content: this legal text discusses a case involving the division of a property among the legal heirs of a deceased person the court has approved a division plan created by a courtappointed expert and has assigned specific portions of the property to each heir the court has also ordered the remaining shares to be allocated through drawing lots additionally one of the heirs has been instructed to compensate the other heirs for the use of the property the court has applied relevant legal provisions related to nondivisible real estate assignment of portions and dissolution of community property the courtappointed expert has provided a detailed description and valuation of the property and a division plan has been accepted by all parties involved the court has also addressed claims for reimbursement of expenses and rental compensation the judgment is considered final and the costs of the proceedings will be divided among the parties in a separate case in torre annunziata the court has made a final decision regarding a dispute over community property the court has declared the dissolution of the community property owned by the parties involved which includes a residential unit a shop and other premises the courtappointed expert has created a division plan dividing the property into four shares with each assignee required to pay a certain amount the remaining shares will be allocated through drawing lots one of the parties has been ordered to pay expenses to the other parties the judgment will be transcribed and the cadastral splitting of the property will be completed the costs of the litigation phase and the courtappointed expert will be settled separately

metadata.CASE_ID: Tribunale Torre Annunziata sez. II, 07/02/2017, n.393
